about_the_game:
Resprite is a pixel art editor. You can use it to create game assets and animations. If you have used image editing software such as GIMP, PhotoShop, Aseprite, iDraw3, etc., you can easily get started. In addition to the regular editing functions, Resprite has the following features:

1. Flexible user interface
Adjust the interface layout to your suitable position
3. Complete timeline support
You can focus on a certain animation clip.
You can set properties such as blending mode for layer groups.
You can set layers as clipping masks.
3. Free-position color palette
You need to store different color groups separately and in an orderly manner.

In addition to the desktop version released on Steam, Resprite is also available on iOS and Android platforms.
